member.name: T:TweetSharp.IClientInfo
member.summary: Interface to an object describing your client

member.name: P:TweetSharp.IClientInfo.ClientName
member.summary: This is the name of your client application.

member.name: P:TweetSharp.IClientInfo.ClientVersion
member.summary: This is the version of your application. This is meta-data only, and not used for client processing.

member.name: P:TweetSharp.IClientInfo.ClientUrl
member.summary: This is the URL of your application. This is meta-data only, and not used for client processing.

member.name: P:TweetSharp.IClientInfo.ConsumerKey
member.summary: If your client is using OAuth authentication, this value should be set to the value of your consumer key. This avoids having to provide the key in every query.

member.name: P:TweetSharp.IClientInfo.ConsumerSecret
member.summary: If your client is using OAuth authentication, this value should be set to the value of your consumer secret. This avoids having to provide the secret in every query.

member.name: P:TweetSharp.IClientInfo.TransparentProxy
member.summary: Since you are communicating from the client-side, this value should point to a proxy that is configured to work transparently (API methods are identical other than the domain), allow cross-domain access, and understand TweetSharp custom headers.

member.summary: Gets or sets the OAuth consumer key.

member.summary: Gets or sets the OAuth consumer secret.

member.summary: Common configuration options for a fluent interface to a web service.

member.name: P:TweetSharp.Fluent.IFluentConfiguration.MockGraph
member.summary: Gets or sets a graph of mock objects to use in a mock query

member.name: P:TweetSharp.Fluent.IFluentConfiguration.MockStatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP status code to return in a mock query.

member.summary: Gets or sets the cache strategy for the query

member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time the cache results should expire

member.name: P:TweetSharp.Fluent.IFluentConfiguration.CacheSlidingExpiration
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time to cache the query results for

member.name: P:TweetSharp.Fluent.IFluentConfiguration.Proxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the address of the proxy server to use for the query

member.name: P:TweetSharp.Fluent.IFluentConfiguration.TransparentProxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the address of a transparent proxy to use for the query The transparent proxy must implement the same endpoints as the service. Example: 'http://api.twitter.com/v1/statuses/hometimeline.json' becomes 'http://transparentproxy.example.com/statuses/hometimeline.json' when the query is submitted.

member.name: P:TweetSharp.Fluent.IFluentConfiguration.RetryPolicy
member.summary: Gets or sets the Retry Policy detailing when failed queries should be retried

member.name: P:TweetSharp.Fluent.IFluentConfiguration.MaxRetries
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times a failing query should be retried. Use in conjunction with

member.name: P:TweetSharp.Fluent.IFluentConfiguration.RequestTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time to wait before aborting a query. If unspecified, the system default is used.

member.name: P:TweetSharp.Fluent.IFluentConfiguration.CompressHttpRequests
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the client should request compressed data from the server.

member.name: P:TweetSharp.Model.TweetSharpResult.IsFromCache

member.name: P:TweetSharp.Model.TweetSharpResult.IsNetworkError

member.name: P:TweetSharp.Model.TweetSharpResult.TimedOut

member.name: T:TweetSharp.Service.ServiceCacheMode
member.summary: Possible caching strategies.

member.name: F:TweetSharp.Service.ServiceCacheMode.None
member.summary: The cache is not used.

member.name: F:TweetSharp.Service.ServiceCacheMode.AbsoluteExpiration
member.summary: The cache uses an absolute expiration.

member.name: F:TweetSharp.Service.ServiceCacheMode.SlidingExpiration
member.summary: The cache uses a sliding expiration. This means after a specified timespan is reached without cache activity for a key, it is invalidated.
